text:
RewardStream * Vancouver * Full Time * Onsite / Remote

Looking for FRONT END WEB DEVELOPERS of all levels (JavaScript, Bootstrap, Angular.JS, RESTful APIs, Java backend). RewardStream operates referral marketing software for large brands like AT&T, Sprint, and Telus. We're about 25 people, young team, chill office, looking to grow our customer base very quickly.

Link: http://rewardstream.com/hiring-senior-software-developer/ (ignore "Senior")
